mapper.select: SELECT A.TCHAT_ROOM_ID, A.TCHAT_ROOM_DT, A.TCHAT_ROOM_IS_DEL, A.TCHAT_ROOM_NAME, A.TCHAT_ROOM_LAST_MSG, A.TCHAT_ROOM_MODI_DT, B.USER_ID, B.TCHAT_USER_IS_DEL FROM TCHAT_ROOM A INNER JOIN TCHAT_PARTICIPANT B ON (A.TCHAT_ROOM_ID = B.TCHAT_ROOM_ID) WHERE A.TCHAT_ROOM_ID = #{tchatRoomId}
SELECT TCHAT_ROOM_ID, TCHAT_ROOM_DT, TCHAT_ROOM_IS_DEL, TCHAT_ROOM_NAME, TCHAT_ROOM_MODI_DT, TCHAT_ROOM_LAST_MSG FROM TCHAT_ROOM WHERE TCHAT_ROOM_ID = #{tchatRoomId}

SELECT 'TR' || LPAD( NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(TCHAT_ROOM_ID, 3, 6))), 0) + 1, 6, '0') AS TCHAT_ROOM_ID FROM TCHAT_ROOM WHERE TCHAT_ROOM_ID LIKE 'TR%'
INSERT INTO TCHAT_ROOM ( TCHAT_ROOM_ID, TCHAT_ROOM_NAME, TCHAT_ROOM_DT, TCHAT_ROOM_IS_DEL ) VALUES ( #{tchatRoomvo.tchatRoomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tchatRoomvo.tchatRoomName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, 'N' )
mapper.select: SELECT A.USER_ID, A.TCHAT_ROOM_ID, A.TCHAT_USER_IS_DEL, B.TCHAT_ROOM_DT, B.TCHAT_ROOM_IS_DEL, B.TCHAT_ROOM_NAME, B.TCHAT_ROOM_LAST_MSG FROM TCHAT_PARTICIPANT A INNER JOIN TCHAT_ROOM B ON (B.TCHAT_ROOM_ID = A.TCHAT_ROOM_ID) WHERE A.USER_ID = #{userid} ORDER BY B.TCHAT_ROOM_MODI_DT DESC

SELECT A.USER_ID, TCHAT_ROOM_ID, TCHAT_USER_IS_DEL ,B.USER_NAME ,B.USER_PROFILE_AFI ,C.FILE_NAME FROM TCHAT_PARTICIPANT A INNER JOIN USERS B ON ( A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN ATCH_FILE_DETAIL C ON (B.USER_PROFILE_AFI = C.ATCH_FILE_ID) WHERE TCHAT_ROOM_ID = #{tchatRoomId}
